payload: tests: pass, lint: pass, typecheck: pass, build: pass. Added two API endpoints: GET /api/pipelines/:id/categorized to download categorized JSON for manual similarity processing, and POST /api/pipelines/:id/similarity-url to submit similarity result URL and resume pipeline with category-split stage. Both endpoints validate pipeline stage and tenant access.
Fix audit vulnerabilities: update bcrypt 5.1.1->6.0.0 to resolve tar package security issues (task-1770556723-88e3)
